name: Grave Robber (Skallu)
description:
"Just a few more graves to plunder and soon I will be rich. Nothing an go wrong, right?"
Those were the last words the protagonist said before he found out that this time he encountered not an ordinary mausoleum...

Jump into action as the eponymous grave robber and explore procedurally generated dungeons full of treasures and dangerous bloodthirsty monsters.

A unique adventure

Explore procedurally generated dungeons that are different every playthrough.

Meet the inhabitants of the mausoleum

A variety of hostile and friendly creatures. Get to know on your own skin which ones are which.

Spill the blodshed

Slay enemies with an arsenal of 9 available melee weapons and firearms or crush them with your own fists.
